AllowCostsInSales.name: AllowCostsInSales
AllowCostsInSales.description: Allow cost base amount and vat amount to be generated in sales entries

BalanceSide.name: BalanceSide
BalanceSide.description: The following values are supported: D (Debit) C (Credit)

BalanceType.name: BalanceType
BalanceType.description: The following values are supported: B (Balance Sheet) W (Profit & Loss)

BelcotaxType.name: BelcotaxType
BelcotaxType.description: Indentify the kind of rewarding for the G/L account. This is used in the official document for the fiscal fiches Belcotax

Code.name: Code
Code.description: Unique Code of the G/L account

Compress.name: Compress
Compress.description: Indicate if this G/L account should be shown as compressed without the details in the CRW report of G/L history

Costcenter.name: Costcenter
Costcenter.description: Cost Center linked to the G/L account

Costunit.name: Costunit
Costunit.description: Cost Unit linked to the G/L account

DeductibilityPercentages.name: DeductibilityPercentages
DeductibilityPercentages.description: Deductibility percentages. You can have several Deductibility percentages, with start and end dates

Description.name: Description
Description.description: Name of the G/L account. If Multilanguage featureset is enabled in the administration and the G/L account already has a set of termed description, this field is not allowed to change.

ExcludeVATListing.name: ExcludeVATListing
ExcludeVATListing.description: General ledger transactions on this G/L account should not appear on the VAT listing

ExpenseNonDeductiblePercentage.name: ExpenseNonDeductiblePercentage
ExpenseNonDeductiblePercentage.description: Expenses on this G/L account can not be used to reduce the incomes

IsBlocked.name: IsBlocked
IsBlocked.description: When blocked you can't use this general ledger account anymore for new entries

Matching.name: Matching
Matching.description: Allow entries on this general ledger account to be matched via the G/L account card

PrivateGLAccount.name: PrivateGLAccount
PrivateGLAccount.description: If a private use percentage is defined, you need to specify the G/L account used for the re-invoice of the private use to the owner of the company

PrivatePercentage.name: PrivatePercentage
PrivatePercentage.description: Specify the percentage of the cost that should be re-invoiced to the owner of the company as private use of the costs

ReportingCode.name: ReportingCode
ReportingCode.description: Used in the export of yearly report

RevalueCurrency.name: RevalueCurrency
RevalueCurrency.description: Indicates if the amounts booked on this general ledger account will be recalculated when currency revaluation is done

Type.name: Type
Type.description: The type of the G/L account. Supported values are:10 = Cash12 = Bank14 = Credit card16 = Payment services20 = Accounts receivable21 = Prepayment accounts receivable22 = Accounts payable24 = VAT25 = Employees payable26 = Prepaid expenses27 = Accrued expenses29 = Income taxes payable30 = Fixed assets32 = Other assets35 = Accumulated depreciation40 = Inventory50 = Capital stock52 = Retained earnings55 = Long term debt60 = Current portion of debt90 = General100 = Tax payable110 = Revenue111 = Cost of goods120 = Other costs121 = Sales, general administrative expenses122 = Depreciation costs123 = Research and development125 = Employee costs126 = Employment costs130 = Exceptional costs140 = Exceptional income150 = Income taxes160 = Interest income300 = Year end reflection301 = Indirect year end costing302 = Direct year end costing

UseCostcenter.name: UseCostcenter
UseCostcenter.description: Indicates if cost centers can be used when using this general ledger account. The following values are supported: 0 (Optional) 1 (Mandatory) 2 (No)

UseCostunit.name: UseCostunit
UseCostunit.description: Indicates if cost units can be used when using this general ledger account. The following values are supported: 0 (Optional) 1 (Mandatory) 2 (No)

VATCode.name: VATCode
VATCode.description: VAT Code linked to the G/L account

VATGLAccountType.name: VATGLAccountType
VATGLAccountType.description: Specify the kind of purchase this G/L account is used for. This is important for the Belgian VAT return to indicate in which VAT box the base amount of purchase should go

VATNonDeductibleGLAccount.name: VATNonDeductibleGLAccount
VATNonDeductibleGLAccount.description: If you use a percentage of non deductible VAT, you can specify another G/L account that will be used for the non deductible part of the VAT amount. This is used directly in the entry application of purchase invoices.

VATNonDeductiblePercentage.name: VATNonDeductiblePercentage
VATNonDeductiblePercentage.description: If not the full amount of the VAT is deductible, you can indicate a percentage for the non decuctible part. This is used during the entry of purchase invoices

VATSystem.name: VATSystem
VATSystem.description: The following values are supported: I (Invoice) C (Cash) (France)

YearEndCostGLAccount.name: YearEndCostGLAccount
YearEndCostGLAccount.description: Indicates the costing account for year end calculations

YearEndReflectionGLAccount.name: YearEndReflectionGLAccount
YearEndReflectionGLAccount.description: Indicates the reflection account that is used by year end application

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to retrieve information of all the G/L accounts of your administration. Aside from that you can also create, update or delete G/L account.Add CustomDescriptionLanguage='[ NL | FR-BE | NL-BE | ... ]' to the header to retrieve language sensitive properties such as descriptions in a specific language.For more information about G/L accounts, you can visit the following help file Working with G/L accounts.
